Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the applicant's failure to disclose a prior visa refusal and unauthorized employment a material misrepresentation under IRPA?
Crimes.Outcome: Applicant found inadmissible for two years
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of immigration officer's decision denying temporary resident visa
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's failure to disclose material facts affected credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Evidence showed full-time unauthorized work from December 2010 to June 2012; application omissions
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Misrepresentation by omission and false declaration regarding employment and prior visa refusal
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Omission of prior visa refusal and unauthorized employment could induce administrative error
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose prior visa refusal and unauthorized employment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Material misrepresentation under IRPA that induces or could induce an error
Crimes.Application_Factor: Applicant claimed no unauthorized employment and omitted prior refusal
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of officer’s finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concealment of prior visa refusal and unauthorized employment
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Documentary evidence of unauthorized work and incomplete application
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant’s declarations were inconsistent with evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimed clerical error, but held accountable as he signed the application
Crimes.Omission_Type: Non-disclosure of prior visa refusal and unauthorized work

Crimes.Violation_Type: Misrepresentation and omission of material facts
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Was the Officer's conclusion that the Applicant engaged in material misrepresentation reasonable?
Crimes.Application_Facts: Applicant failed to disclose prior visa refusal and misrepresented employment status
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Applicant found inadmissible for two years
Crimes.Claimant_Status: Foreign national applying for temporary resident visa
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Concealed prior visa refusal and unauthorized employment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Misrepresentation that induces or could induce an error in administration of IRPA
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Significance of omitted information to admissibility decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant not credible due to deliberate omissions despite signing application
Crimes.Evidence_Used: Employment records, visa history, application form
Crimes.Application_Basis: Temporary resident visa application with incomplete disclosures
Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Prior visa refusal and unauthorized work confirmed
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of documentation supporting lawful employment
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Potential undermining of immigration system integrity
Crimes.Cause_Description: Failure to disclose relevant history affecting eligibility
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Officer relied on verified records to assess misrepresentation
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Contradictions between application and factual evidence
Crimes.Residency_Compliance: Unauthorized employment violated conditions of stay
Crimes.Misrepresentation_Element: Omission and false statements on application
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Omissions were material and could lead to erroneous approval
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies between applicant’s claims and documented facts
Crimes.Legal_Standard_Applied: Reasonableness standard applied in judicial review
